item.description:
Thanks to Matt for the following tip.

The academy awards-nominated animation shorts are playing Friday, March 6th at the ICA. I scheduled a meetup in honor of tonight's Oscars. Several films in the list are computer generated digital 3D animations, which might interest some in our group.

The popularity of these shows increase following the awards, but I don't know if they will sell out or not. Tickets are $9 ($7 for members, students, and seniors), and can be purchased online for $12 at https://buy.icaboston....

I would suggest purchasing tickets in advance and RSVP Yes *after* you have tickets.

I will contact those who rsvp yes about meeting in advance.

David

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Acadamey Nominated Short Animated Films @ the ICA
